entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
